data.title: List of coupled cousins
data.meta_description: This is a list of prominent individuals who have been romantically or maritally coupled with a cousin. AAbdullah ibn Abdul-Muttalib and his third cousin once removed, Aminah John Adams and his third cousin, Abigail Smith[1] John Adams II and his first cousin, Mary Catherine Hellen. Mary Louisa...
